Advanced.Enable duplicate page submissions: Yes - Enable page to be re-posted

Help.Help Text:
To find data enter a search term into the search dialog, or click on the column headings to limit the records returned.

You can perform numerous functions by clicking the Actions button. This includes selecting the columns that are displayed / hidden and their display sequence, plus numerous data and format functions. You can also define additional views of the data using the chart, group by, and pivot options.

If you want to save your customizations select report, or click download to unload the data. Enter you email address and time frame under subscription to be sent the data on a regular basis.

For additional information click Help at the bottom of the Actions menu.

Click the Reset button to reset the interactive report back to the default settings.

Source.SQL Query: select ID_WYDANIA, ID_WYDANIA AS USUŃ, (select nazwa_sruby from sruba s where s.id_sruby=x.id_sruby) AS NAZWA_SRUBY, ' ' AS Informacje, DATA_WYDANIA, DATA_WAZNOSCI from WYDANIE_CERTYFIKATU_SRUBY x WHERE SYMBOL_CERTYFIKATU=:P100_SYMBOL

Pagination.Type: Row Ranges X to Y (with next and previous links)

Source.SQL Query: select ID_WYDANIA, (select d.nazwa_dodatku from dodatek d where d.id_dodatku=x.id_dodatku) AS NAZWA_DODATKU, ' ' AS Informacje, DATA_WYDANIA, DATA_WAZNOSCI, ID_WYDANIA AS USUŃ from WYDANIE_CERTYFIKATU_DODATKU x WHERE SYMBOL_CERTYFIKATU=:P100_SYMBOL

Pagination.Type: Row Ranges X to Y (with next and previous links)

Source.SQL Query:
select SYMBOL_CERTYFIKATU LIST_TITLE,
    null LINK_CLASS,
    apex_page.get_url(p_items => 'P100_SYMBOL', p_values => "SYMBOL_CERTYFIKATU") LINK,
    --null ICON_CLASS,
    null LINK_ATTR,
    --null ICON_COLOR_CLASS,
    case when coalesce(:P100_SYMBOL,'0') = "SYMBOL_CERTYFIKATU"
      then 'is-active' 
      else ' '
    end LIST_CLASS,
    KLASYFIKACJE LIST_TEXT--,
    --null LIST_BADGE
from CERTYFIKAT x
  where (:P100_SEARCH is null
        or upper(x."SYMBOL_CERTYFIKATU") like '%'||upper(:P100_SEARCH)||'%'
        or upper(x."KLASYFIKACJE") like '%'||upper(:P100_SEARCH)||'%'
    )

Pagination.Type: Row Ranges X to Y (with next and previous links)

Source.SQL Query:
SELECT opis
FROM certyfikat WHERE symbol_certyfikatu=:P100_SYMBOL;
